wikipedia_page.main: Ernest Still was  a rugby union international who represented England from 1873 to 1873.

response: England: Charles Vanderspar (Richmond), Frederick Mills (Marlborough Nomads), Sydney Morse (Law Club), Harold Freeman (Marlborough Nomads), Cecil Boyle (Oxford University), Stephen Finney (I.C.E.
